panels.description: Shows data for the last 5 minutes, the average over a 5 minute period and the total for the time range. Note that in situations where this spans over a large time period (like a year or similar) the current value will be incorrect
panels.title: Notify (per 5 minutes)

panels.description: Shows data for the last 5 minutes, the average over a 5 minute period and the total for the time range. Note that in situations where this spans over a large time period (like a year or similar) the current value will be incorrect
panels.title: Status Updates (per 5 minutes)

panels.description: Shows data for the last 5 minutes, the average over a 5 minute period and the total for the time range. Note that in situations where this spans over a large time period (like a year or similar) the current value will be incorrect.
panels.title: Content Changes (per 5 minutes)

targets.query: application:email-alert-api.*publishing.service.gov.uk-json.event.access AND beat.hostname: backend-lb-* AND status: [200 TO 299]
application:email-alert-api.*publishing.service.gov.uk-json.event.access AND beat.hostname: backend-lb-* AND status: [400 TO 499]
application:email-alert-api.*publishing.service.gov.uk-json.event.access AND beat.hostname: backend-lb-* AND status: [500 TO 599]
_type: elb AND loadbalancer: "email-alert-api-internal" AND backend_status_code: [200 TO 299]
_type: elb AND loadbalancer: "email-alert-api-internal" AND backend_status_code: [400 TO 499]
_type: elb AND loadbalancer: "email-alert-api-internal" AND backend_status_code: [500 TO 599]
application:email-alert-api-public.*publishing.service.gov.uk-json.event.access AND beat.hostname: backend-lb-* AND status: [200 TO 299]
application:email-alert-api-public.*publishing.service.gov.uk-json.event.access AND beat.hostname: backend-lb-* AND status: [400 TO 499]
application:email-alert-api-public.*publishing.service.gov.uk-json.event.access AND beat.hostname: backend-lb-* AND status: [500 TO 599]
_type: elb AND loadbalancer: "email-alert-api-public" AND backend_status_code: [200 TO 299]
_type: elb AND loadbalancer: "email-alert-api-public" AND backend_status_code: [400 TO 499]
_type: elb AND loadbalancer: "email-alert-api-public" AND backend_status_code: [500 TO 599]

panels.description: This shows the max, mean and min values of the time that has elapsed from when a content change entered the system and an email is first attempted for delivery. To provide decent samples the data is summarised to 5 minute intervals.
panels.title: Time from content change created until Notify first attempt

panels.description: This shows the max, mean and min values of the time that has elapsed from when an email is created in the system and when that email is first sent to notify for delivery. To provide decent samples the data is summarised to 5 minute intervals.
panels.title: Time from email created until Notify first attempt

panels.description: This shows the max, mean and min values of the time it takes to request notify to deliver an email. To provide decent samples the data is summarised to 5 minute intervals.
panels.title: Time to request email delivery
Time to initiate daily digest emails
Time to generate daily digest emails
Time to initiate weekly digest emails
Time to generate weekly digest emails
